import React from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' function ProductScreen() { const match = useParams() const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.id) return ( <> Go back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
